description: Your TV has hundreds of channels, but how many do you actually watch? Most people stick to their favorite 5-10 channels. Now RCA gives you a way to access them instantly, at just a click. Like presets on a car radio, the RCA Universal Remotes with presets let you set your favorites, then go to them with a single button press. This remote can control up to 6-devices.
title: RCA RCRPS06GR 6-Device Remote with Presets
